# Beast Bond (Trait)
## Overview
**Beast Bond**: You share a close bond with animals. You gain a +1 bonus on [[Handle Animal (Skill)|Handle Animal]] checks and [[Ride (Skill)|Ride]] checks. One of these skills (your choice) is always a class skill for you. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 59
